overview: He’s the handsome, stylish Czech stud with the royal name – King Arthur! – and the majestic, king-sized ramrod that’s not averse to slinging its way into any cute, horny twink he encounters! Lads like Erik Franke, Ian Ross and Ivo Thomas, who are only too willing and eager to taste the full length of Arthur’s sword given the chance! What’s more, happy to prove his metrosexual credentials, he’s also open-minded enough to surrender his own pert little rump to the right guy. Harry Vakker, you have no idea how fucking lucky you are …
title: Let's Play with Arthur Kral
